p: Wang et al. [ 232] reported on the use of ultrasound-assisted extraction during the purification of taurine from Porphyra yezoensis. This sulfur-containing amino acid can enhance seafood profile flavour. Homotaurine, an aminosulfonate compound present in different species, has shown in vitro and in vivo neuroprotective effect and could be a promising drug for both prevention of Alzheimer’s disease [ 234]. Operating at 40 °C and 300 W, the ultrasonic process lowered the extraction time by nine compared to the conventional extraction.
